location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of supplies shipped to Bushire for the use of the British Mission to Persia, as mentioned in the orders of the Bombay Government dated 2 May 1811. It further notes that William Bruce is awaiting further instructions from Sir Gore Ouseley concerning them.
